::Kluster/Grimmler::

Kluster frowns as the computer reports a creature outside. He looks at 
Grimmler.

"There's someone outside. Can you see what they want before going off on your 
mission?"

Grimmler nods. "Sure."

He stands up, and, motioning for Mangus and Valtron to follow, walks out of 
the room, heading for the exit.
